page.description: Returns TRUE if table is encrypted.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.ENCRYPTED() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltTBL>.ENCRYPTED() Description The &ltTBL>.ENCRYPTED() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the table referenced by &ltTBL> is encrypted; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE). Example Open a table, supplying its password, then test its encryption status. dim t as P t = table.open("customer",FILE_RW_EXCLUSIVE,"","swordfish") ? t.encrypted() = .T.
See Also Table Functions and Methods, Encryption Functions and Methods
